headline: Why Rare Earths and Miner Stocks Soared Thursday
summary: Shares of companies outside of China that produce rare earths and minerals surged Thursday as the country moved to tighten exports.

headline: Isabella Bank Appoints Financial Executive Brian Tessin to its Boards of Directors
summary: MT. PLEASANT, MI / ACCESS Newswire / October 9, 2025 / Isabella Bank Corporation has appointed Brian Tessin to the Isabella Bank Board and Isabella Bank Corporation Board of Directors, effective October 6, 2025. Mr. Tessin is the Chief Tax Officer ...

headline: Can Analyst Optimism Ahead of Earnings Signal a Turning Point for Albemarle (ALB) in Lithium?
summary: In recent developments, Albemarle has drawn increased analyst attention ahead of its scheduled earnings announcement on November 5, 2025, with positive earnings surprise metrics and a strong track record of estimate revisions highlighting heightened investor interest. This growing analyst optimism is particularly notable amid broader discussions about near-term financial performance and market positioning within the lithium sector. With analysts flagging a potential earnings surprise, we'll...
